dcterms:description: The Radboud Faces Database (RaFD) is a high-quality faces database containing pictures of 67 models displaying 8 emotional expressions according to the Facial Action Coding System, with each emotion shown in three different gaze directions.
dcterms:title: Radboud Faces Database (RaFD)
